NPA Computers

Asset Manager
June - August 2017

Contracted by MTA of NY to take inventory of company computers and other electronic equipment. All equipment was tagged, scanned and catalogued alongside other relevant information regarding the user and work environment. Devices were inventoried in various environments of ranging sensitivity, from cubicles and offices to secure server rooms and security checkpoints.
